name: Gravity Shooter!
description:
This is my 2D Shooter Project v.1.0b. (Released 31st August 2021, 11.20 am IST)

Modifications:

  1. Added a Boss in the last level.
  2. Environmental threats like asteroids, comets and a black hole.
  3. Modifications to UI design.

Update v.1.1b:  (Released 1st September 2021, 10.35 am IST)

  1. Fixed second level where enemies were caught in friendly fire.
  2. Improved UI design

Hotfix Update v.1.2b:  (Released 1st September 2021, 7.35 pm IST)

  1. Fixed various UI issues.
  2. Second level is made a bit easier due to player complaints.
